Ref: CXP065/2023

Criteria:
Grade 12 plus a relevant qualification in human resources
3-5 years experience in an HR role.
Excellent telephone, verbal, and written communication skills.

Computer Literate – Sage
Adherence to confidentiality with good ethical judgement.
Must be approachable and helpful.
Strong critical thinking skills.
Great attention to detail

Apply via website or alternatively, via: https://forms.gle/8mRbBqpY1WY7fSPs7
